When Renegade Class enters, mobolize. [i](Create a 2/1 colorless Ship artifact vehicle token with flying and crew 2.)[/i]
{1}{U}: Level 2
As long as you have a full party, whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, draw a card.
{5}{U}: Level 3
Discard a card: Exile target creature you control. Return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
